text: Neither a violation of this chapter nor compliance herewith shall constitute any evidence of negligence or contributory negligence, nor shall either a violation or compliance provide any basis for a civil action for damages.

title.text: Motor and Non-Motor Vehicles and Traffic. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Evidentiary effect; basis for civil liability.
